HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Yahishwe, yizewe kandi irinzwe na Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Tugira umutekano ukomeye w’amakuru yawe yihariye. Amakuru yose arakunzwe ku ruhande rw’umukiriya. Nta kintu tuzi ku kugaragaza IP yawe, ibyo usangira, cyangwa uwo usangira imiyoboro y’ibanga nayo—n'ibikomeye, ibikubiye muri byo.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Ni wowe wenyine uzi umurongo w’amakuru y’ibanga wakoresheje n’abo uyisangiza. Iyo ukora ibanga, ushobora kongeramo ijambo ry’ibanga mbere yo gukurura. Byongeye, birashoboka gushyiraho igihe cy’imyanda. Nubwo byaba bimeze bite, ibanga rizakurwaho nyuma y'iminsi 14.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_TITLE: Yahishwe kuva ku mpera kugera ku mpera
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Imiyoboro yose n’ibikubiye muri byo birahindurwa ku ruhande rw’umukiriya, bisobanura ko n’ubwo twe ubwacu tudashobora kumenya umurongo n’ibikubiye muri byo. Umuyoboro wose ufite ID idasanzwe ifite uburebure bwa 36 ari bwo bwo kwibagirwa kugirango ushobore kubona Ubutumwa Bw’ibanga n’ibikubiye muri byo byahishwe na AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Andika ubutumwa bwawe cyangwa ushyiremo ijambo ry’ibanga
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Yahishwe, yizewe kandi irinzwe na Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Andika ubutumwa bwawe bw’ibanga, ijambo ry’ibanga cyangwa amakuru yihariye *

VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Andika kandi ohereza ubutumwa, buzakurwaho nyuma yo gusomwa.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Kuramo Stellar Secret ku murongo, kora ubutumwa bwawe bw’ibanga
